title: why is mejais still in this game?
body:
Mejais soulstealer should have gone when blade of the occult and leviathan got removed.. the game is snowbally enough, no need to have this item anymore.

Its not even a noob trap, this item is straight cancer on champions like lux and orianna who have such high ranged damage and cc, alongside shields that the item actually just makes them unstoppable if they get it stacked.

If i dont get to have a stacking ad item on a class of characters where i actually have to take risks to snowball, then ap mages definitely shouldnt get a stacking ap item without having to take risks.

Inc downvotes from the mage circlejerk.

I honestly think that Mejai's is a great item, even though I don't use it. It adds a high risk/reward system into the game and forces you to predict as far as 30 minutes or more into the game. If you predict that you'll get fed and carry the game, you buy it. If you feed instead, it's your own fault for not predicting correctly. You need to consider every single factor into this. 
Ex.

* You are 2/0/0 at 10 minutes.
* You are ahead in cs.
* No lanes are feeding.

_You buy a Soulstealer, and carry the game to victory._

* The enemy team drew first blood at top lane.
* You are 2/0/0 at 10 minutes.
* Bot lane is forced to recall, with no casualties.

_You buy a Soulstealer, top and bot lanes fall behind. You are killed multiple times; you sell the Soulstealer and fall behind on gold._

See what I mean? It's all about betting on what you think will happen, and you need to find the correct solution, considering all factors. Also, it's a fun item that forces you to be extremely careful.
